# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
.vs/
.vscode/
.idea/

# User-specific files for Visual Studio for Mac
.vscode/

# User-specific files for Rider
.idea/

# Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

# Windows Installer files for NuGet package creation
*.snupkg

# Windows Installer - Debug/Release build files
[Dd]ebug/
[Dd]ebugPublic/
[Dd]ebugFinal/
[Dd]Release/
[Dd]ReleasePublic/
[Dd]ReleaseFinal/

# Windows Installer - Build output directory
bin/
obj/

# .NET Core & .NET 5+/6+ directories
bin/
obj/

# .NET Core
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
Scaffolding/

# Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

# Windows Installer - Debug/Release build files
[Dd]ebug/
[Dd]ebugPublic/
[Dd]ebugFinal/
[Dd]Release/
[Dd]ReleasePublic/
[Dd]ReleaseFinal/

# User-specific files
.idea/

# .NET build output directories
bin/
obj/

# Logs
*.log

# ASP.NET temporary files
app_data/

# Web tooling directories
node_modules/

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/

# User-specific files for Visual Studio for Mac
.vscode/

# ASP.NET Core
.vscode/

# Package directories
packages/

# .NET tooling generated files
.vs2019/
.vs2017/

# Miscellaneous
*.swp
*.swo
